mapper.insert: insert into tb_looper (id, title, `order`, state, target_url, image_url, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{targetUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_looper set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `order` = #{order,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target_url = #{targetUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image_url = #{imageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, title, `order`, state, target_url, image_url, create_time, update_time from tb_looper order by `create_time` DESC
select id, title, `order`, state, target_url, image_url, create_time, update_time from tb_looper where state != '0' order by `create_time` DESC
